## 📅 December 02, 2025

### 🐟 Freshwater Stressors
Mechanistic, physiological, and quantitative studies for evaluating stressors to freshwater habitats of Pacific salmon, including cumulative stressors.

- 🌱 [Analysis of forestry effects on Pacific salmon in Musgamagw Dzawada’enuxw territory and across
coastal BC.](pages/bcsrif/BCSRIF_2022_449.html) | Salmon Coast Field Station Society
- 🌱 [Developing a cumulative effects modelling framework for the recovery of aquatic salmonid populations](pages/bcsrif/BCSRIF_2020_217.html) | University of British Columbia (Vancouver), Institute for the Oceans and Fisheries
- ❓ [Development of geospatial tools for large-scale freshwater salmon habitat assessment by the Freshwater Spatial Ecology Program](pages/other/2425.html) | Presenters TBD
- 🌱 [First Nations led salmon habitat and population monitoring, research and cumulative effects assessment in the Lower Fraser River and Boundary Bay](pages/bcsrif/BCSRIF_2022_334.html) | Salish Sea Indigenous Guardians Association
- ❓ [Improved understanding of cumulative impacts on salmon survival across freshwater life-stages; tools and approaches for mechanistic assessments](pages/other/2493.html) | Presenters TBD
- ❓ [Mechanistic modelling to link hydrology to juvenile salmon habitat quality and productivity](pages/other/2424.html) | Presenters TBD
- ❓ [Quantifying Yukon Chinook migration mortality and its implications for fisheries management and rebuilding under the Fish Stock Provisions of the Fisheries Act](pages/other/2402.html) | Presenters TBD
- ❓ [Quantitative assessment of the impact of Smallmouth Bass suppression efforts in Cultus Lake and SMB emigration from Cultus Lake](pages/other/2443.html) | Presenters TBD

### 🐟 Salmon In A Changing Climate
Long-term implications of climate change for Pacific Salmon and their ecosystems.

- ❓ [Adaptive genetic variation and climate change resilience in Canadian Pacific salmon](pages/other/2437.html) | Presenters TBD
- ❓ [Biological models to support prioritizing salmon stocks under future climates](pages/other/2405.html) | Presenters TBD
- ❓ [Changing coastal productivity: Using sediment cores, water properties and archived plankton data to identify changes at the bottom of the food web in BC’s coastal waters](pages/other/2406.html) | Presenters TBD
- ❓ [Climate Downscaling for salmon conservation in Marine Ecosystems](pages/other/2539.html) | Presenters TBD
- 🌱 [Development of High-resolution Climate Change Freshwater Hazard Data for BC](pages/bcsrif/BCSRIF_2022_384.html) | Pacific Climate Impacts Consortium
- 🌱 [Evaluating climate change scenarios for the Quesnel Watershed to determine flood, fire and temperature risks posed to Upper Fraser salmon stocks.](pages/bcsrif/BCSRIF_2022_399.html) | University of Northern British Columbia, Department of Geography, Earth and Environmental Sciences
- 🌱 [Supporting and connecting community-based monitoring for climate-resilient salmon ecosystems](pages/bcsrif/BCSRIF_2022_401.html) | Pacific Salmon Foundation
